details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.11 Fonts - 6.2.11.7 Unicode character maps - Unicode PUA
details.description: For any character, regardless of its rendering mode, that is mapped to a code or codes in the Unicode Private Use Area (PUA), an ActualText entry as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.9.4 shall be present for this character or a sequence of characters of which such a character is a part.
